effects.effect:
User waits for two turns.  On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pok√©mon to hit it.  Damage inflicted is typeless.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effects.shortEffect: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

moveDescription:
The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes
back to cause double the damage taken.
